Package weka.core.tokenizers

Class WordTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.tokenizers.Tokenizer
      • weka.core.tokenizers.CharacterDelimitedTokenizer
        • weka.core.tokenizers.WordTokenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String>, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
    public class WordTokenizer
extends CharacterDelimitedTokenizer
    A simple tokenizer that is using the java.util.StringTokenizer class to tokenize the strings.

    Valid options are: 

     -delimiters <value>
  The delimiters to use
  (default ' \r\n\t.,;:'"()?!').
    Version:
    $Revision: 10203 $
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
